content.prompt: Which of the following best describes a similarity between the arguments made by Chief Joseph and Commissioner Parker in the excerpts?

choices.label: Both argued that the spread of Christianity was a positive influence on American Indians.
Both asserted that the federal government had legal authority over American Indians.
Both argued against the signing of treaties to take American Indian lands.
Both believed that American Indians required moral training.

topic.text: 6.3: Westward Expansion - Social and Cultural Development

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
